data.name: Gemini StrategyDLCï¼šNie's Biography
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is Nie's personal biography, it activates after recruiting Nie.
The DLC is divided into 5 parts, you can use your data from the main game to play the DLC, and you can receive extra talent points useable in the main game too.
The equipment obtained in the DLC can be used in the main game.

data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Graphics: 256M
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
